multiplechoiceresponse.label: Which of the following is an example of a vegetable?
multiplechoiceresponse.description: You can select only one option.

choicegroup.choice: apple An apple is the fertilized ovary that comes from an apple tree and contains seeds classifying it as a fruit.
pumpkin A pumpkin is the fertilized ovary of a squash plant and contains seeds classifying it as a fruit.
potato A potato is an edible part of a plant in tuber form and is classified as a vegetable
tomato Many people mistakenly think a tomato is a vegetable. However, because a tomato is the fertilized ovary of a tomato plant and contains seeds it is classified as a fruit.
